page.title: 06A day in the life of Sharon
page.content:
By Sharon Wilkins Age 11years
I get up at 8.00 am have a wash and get dressed and have my breakfast at about 8.15 am.I usually have cornflakes.Then I put all my things into my bag.I put in there my daps (plimsoles) and lunch box. I go to school at 8.50 am. The register is taken and followed by a Maths lesson. After a break is English. Dinner is at 12.00. I have packed lunch. After dinner we have a break for half an hour before we come in and do topic work. We have a story at about 3.00 until hometime which at 3.30.I go home and have a cooked tea .If it is fine I go out to play at about 5.00. My favourite play place is the golf course. I come home at 7.30 and have a bath. I have supper,clean my teeth and go to bed at 9.00.
